------------
Introduction
------------

`medialog.hidetitle` is a simple package that adds an option to hide the content items title and description 
Half of the code is taken from collective.flag from jarn.no

       
----
        
Changelog
=========
        
0.2 - Mars 1, 2011
---------------------
        
* First version

Keywords: plone zope hide title description
